song.title: Cornerstone
song.lyrics:
[INTRO] .G Em C D
[1] .G My hope is built on nothing less .C9 D Than Jesus' blood and righteousness || .Em I dare not trust the sweetest frame .C9 D G But wholly trust is Jesus' name
[C] . C9 Em D Christ alone, Cornerstone .G/B C9 Em D Weak made strong in the Savior's love || .G C9 Through the storm .Em D He is Lord . G Lord of all
[T] . Em He is Lord . C D Lord of all --- [2] .G When darkness seems to hide His face .C9 D I rest on His unchanging grace || .Em In every high and stormy gale .C9 D Em My anchor holds within the veil .C9 D G My anchor holds within the veil
[3] .G His oath, His covenant, His blood, .C D Support me in the whelming flood; .Em When all around my soul gives way, .C D G He then is all my hope and stay .C D G He then is all my hope and stay
[4] .G When He shall come with trumpet sound .C9 D Oh may I then in Him be found || .Em Dressed in His righteousness alone .C9 D G Faultless, stand before the throne
;1 2 C 3 C T C 4 C
